## Size.Lerp() method

Creates a new Size set at the linear interpolation "amount" between "start" and "end"

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static Lerp(start: Size, end: Size, amount: number): Size;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  start | <code>Size</code> | starting size to lerp between |
|  end | <code>Size</code> | end size to lerp between |
|  amount | <code>number</code> | amount to lerp between the start and end values |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Size`

a new Size set at the linear interpolation "amount" between "start" and "end"
